page.title: 07 Recreation cont'd
page.content: After lunch I raced my Dad home and beat him by ten minutes although he went in the car. I lit our fire in the fire place in the lounge. After tea I typed in a program on our computer, and as usual it didn't work. After that I played roughball with some friends. The River which runs through{Long {Bennington}is the{Witham.}It's not far away so we visit it quite often. There are many fish to be caught in the Witham, like chub, perch, tench, eel, dace, trout and roach and many more. In the woods nearby ivy grows all over. Some gardens go down to the river along the west bank making it convenient for people owning canoes. A path through the fields follows the east bank.
